Field Detail

DEFAULT_BIAS_LEARNING_RATE

public static double DEFAULT_BIAS_LEARNING_RATE
The default bias learning rate for this layer. The default learning rate is 0.05

DEFAULT_BIAS_MOMENTUM

public static double DEFAULT_BIAS_MOMENTUM
The default momentum value for the biases of this layer. The default momentum value is 0.5

DEFAULT_BIAS_WEIGHTCOST

public static double DEFAULT_BIAS_WEIGHTCOST
The default weight cost for the biases of this layer. The default weight cost is 0.00002 of the default bias learning rate.

Constructor Detail

Layer

public Layer(int numUnits)
Creates a new instance of Layer consisting of 'numUnits' units. Biases are initialized to 0 (zero).

Parameters:
numUnits - must be an integer > 0
Method Detail

changeNumUnits

public void changeNumUnits(int newNumOfUnits)
Changes the number of units in this layer. If the number of units are increased, previous bias values of each unit are preserved, but the new biases of each new additional unit is set to 0. If the number of units is decreased, then all biases are preserved.

Parameters:
newNumOfUnits - must be an integer > 0

getLearningRate

public double getLearningRate()
Returns:
the current learning rate of this layer's biases.

setLearningRate

public void setLearningRate(double newLearningRate)
Sets this layer's bias learning rate to the specified value.

Parameters:
newLearningRate - must be a small non-negative number (preferably less than 0.1)

getWeightCost

public double getWeightCost()
Returns:
the current weight cost of this layer's biases.

setWeightCost

public void setWeightCost(double newWeightCost)
Sets this layer's bias weight cost to the specified value.

Parameters:
newWeightCost - must be a very small non-negative number (preferably several orders of magnitude smaller than the current learning rate).

getMomentum

public double getMomentum()
Returns:
the current momentum value of this layer's biases.

setMomentum

public void setMomentum(double newMomentum)
Sets this layer's momenum to the specified value.

Parameters:
newMomentum - must be a small non-negative number (preferably less than 1.0)

getBiases

public double[] getBiases()
Returns a reference to this layer's biases.

Returns:
an array of doubles of the biases of the units in this Layer.

setBiases

public void setBiases(double[] newBiases)
Copies the new bias values in the specified array into this layer's biases. If newBiases.length > the number of units in this layer, the function only copies the values necessary starting from newBiases[0]. If newBiases.length < the number of units in this layer, the function only changes the first newBiases.length number of biases in this layer.

Parameters:
newBiases - must be a non-empty array.

getBiasIncrement

public double[] getBiasIncrement()
Returns a reference to this layer's previous bias increment.

Returns:
an array representing this layer's previous bias increment.

setBiasIncrement

public void setBiasIncrement(double[] newBiasIncrement)
Copies the new bias increment values in the specified array into this layer's bias increments. If newBiasIncrement.length > the number of units in this layer, the function only copies the values necessary starting from newBiasIncrement[0]. If newBiasIncrement.length < the number of units in this layer, the function only changes the first newBiasIncrement.length number of biases in this layer.

Parameters:
newBiasIncrement -

CopyLayerParameters

public void CopyLayerParameters(Layer layerToCopy)
This function sets this layer's biases, bias increments, learning rate, momentum, and weight cost values to the same values as the layer passed into this function. This is useful if you want to convert one type of layer to another type.

Parameters:
layerToCopy - The Layer to be copied.

getLayerDerivative

public abstract double[] getLayerDerivative(double[] layerActivities)
Parameters:
layerActivities - The activations that came from this layer of units. The size of the array should be equal to the number of units in this layer.
Returns:
An array containing derivatives of this layer at the specified activations. The returned array will be the same as the number of units in this layer.

getLayerDerivative

public double[][] getLayerDerivative(double[][] batchLayerActivities)
Parameters:
batchLayerActivities - A batch of activations that came from this layer of units.
Returns:
A batch of data vectors containing derivatives of this layer at the specified activations.

getActivationProbabilities

public abstract double[][] getActivationProbabilities(double[][] productSum)
Parameters:
productSum - a batch of data vectors stored in an array of dimension [n][numUnitsInThisLayer], where 'n' is the number of data vectors and must be > 0.
Returns:
a batch of activation probabilities for each data vector.

generateData

public double[] generateData(double[] activation_probabilities)
Parameters:
activation_probabilities - A data vector containing the activation probabilities for each unit in this Layer.
Returns:
A data vector containing the activities/activations of each unit in this Layer.

generateData

public abstract double[][] generateData(double[][] activation_probabilities)
Parameters:
activation_probabilities - A batch of activation probabilities for each unit in this Layer.
Returns:
A batch of activities/activations for each unit in this Layer.

updateBiases

public void updateBiases(double[] positivePhaseData,
                         double[] negativePhaseData)
Parameters:
positivePhaseData - A data vector containing generated data of an RBM during its positive phase.
negativePhaseData - A data vector containing the generated data of an RBM during its negative phase.

updateBiases

public void updateBiases(double[][] positivePhaseData,
                         double[][] negativePhaseData)
Parameters:
positivePhaseData - A batch of data vectors containing generated data of an RBM during its positive phase.
negativePhaseData - A batch of data vectors containing the generated data of an RBM during its negative phase.

getNumUnits

public int getNumUnits()
Returns:
Returns the number of units in this Layer.

getLayerType

public java.lang.String getLayerType()
Returns:
Returns the layer-type of this Layer; the name of the implementing class.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
